title: Lohum to invest '1kcr in battery production
description: Lithium-ion battery pack manufacturer and recycling company Lohum on Wednesday announced it will invest '1,000 crore in the next three years to develop and manufacture manganese-based lithium-ion batteries Further, the company said it has roped in Tesla veteran Chaitanya Sharma to help in the project.
